content_data.name: Bestselling Bundles
content_data.description: Our customers have spoken! These are the most loved bundles in our collection. Quality-tested and customer-approved virgin hair bundles from Brazil, Vietnam, Peru, and more.

content_data.name: Raw Hair Collection
content_data.description: Experience the ultimate in luxury with our Raw Hair Collection. Each bundle is collected from single donors, never chemically processed, and known for exceptional longevity. Investment-worthy hair that lasts 3-5 years with proper care.

content_data.name: HD Lace Essentials
content_data.description: Complete your install with our HD Lace Collection. Featuring the thinnest, most invisible lace available. Our closures and frontals are pre-plucked with baby hairs and bleached knots for an undetectable, natural-looking hairline.

content_data.name: Glueless Wig Collection
content_data.description: New to wigs? Start here! Our Glueless Wig Collection features pre-cut lace, adjustable straps, and secure combs - no adhesive needed. Perfect for beginners or anyone who wants a quick, damage-free wig experience.

content_data.name: Wig Installation Essentials
content_data.description: Get that snatched, natural-looking wig install with our essential products. From professional-grade adhesives to lace melting sprays and tints - we have everything you need for a flawless finish.
content_data.short_description: Everything for a perfect wig install

content_data.name: New Arrivals
content_data.description: Be the first to shop our latest drops! Fresh bundles, new wig styles, and trending accessories. Updated weekly with the hottest new products.

content_data.name: Under $100
content_data.description: Quality doesn't have to break the bank! Shop our selection of premium hair bundles, closures, and accessories all priced under $100. Perfect for budget-conscious queens who don't compromise on quality.

content_data.name: Blonde Hair Collection
content_data.description: Go blonde without the damage! Our pre-colored 613 blonde collection features virgin human hair that can be toned to any shade. From platinum to honey blonde, ash to strawberry - the possibilities are endless.
